loops.description: Each loop iteration will create a child cross sell Opportunity

loops.description: This is looping the trades the user selected from the previous screen, not all trades from the Opportunity from which the Flow was launched from.

recordUpdates.description: Set 'Project Size' & 'Opportunity Notes' from values specified on the previous screen
recordUpdates.name: Update_Current_Opportunity
recordUpdates.label: Update Current Opportunity

fields.name: Confirmation_Screen_dt
fields.fieldText:
The two fields below (Project Size & Opportunity Notes) can be edited now.

Any updates will be reflected on the opportunity record once the Finish button below is clicked.

fields.name: Confirmation_Screen_dt_3
fields.fieldText:
Below, you can add or remove job sites.

Confirm the job sites are correct and make any necessary changes before clicking 'Finish'.

fields.name: Deletion_Confirmation_Screen_dt
fields.fieldText:
Confirm you would like to delete these Opportunity Job Sites

By clicking 'Confirm Deletion' you are removing the Job Site from the Opportunity. It will still exist as a Job Site connected to the Account.

fields.name: End_Screen_dt
fields.fieldText:
No Partners selected.

Use the 'Previous' button to go back and select a Partner for one of this Opportunities trades or close this window.

fields.name: Error_Screen_dt
fields.fieldText: Error: Unexpected Flow state. Please contact your Salesforce admin for assistance.

fields.name: Final_Screen_dt
fields.fieldText: Your Cross-Sell opportunities have been created and notification has been sent to the Partner Sales Leader / EPP Contact.

fields.name: New_Job_Site_Screen_dt
fields.fieldText: Fill in the details for the new Opportunity Job Site

fields.name: Partner_Selection_Screen_dt_2
fields.fieldText:
Select the partner you've already communicated with about the project.

If you haven't discussed this trade with a Partner check 'Skip this trade'

fields.name: Add_Another_Partner_To_This_Trade
fields.fieldText: Add Another Partner To This Trade

variables.description: Used to blank out other collection vars
variables.name: EMPTY_Text_Collection

variables.description: Increments by 1 for each iteration of 'Loop Selected Trades'. Used to generate temporary record IDs for Opportunity_Cross_Sell_Request__c so that the collection variable can be displayed in a Datatable.
variables.name: Loop_Counter

variables.description: NOTE: Although this variable is of type Opportunity_Cross_Sell_Request__c, this Flow never creates any records of this type. We are using a record variable of this type here to track which Partner__c is selected for each of the selected Trades.
variables.name: Request_Collection

variables.description: NOTE: Although this variable is of type Opportunity_Cross_Sell_Request__c, this Flow never creates any records of this type. We are using a record variable of this type here to track which Partner__c is selected for each of the selected Trades.
variables.name: Request_Single

variables.description: How many trades are selected on the current Opportunity
variables.name: Selected_Trades_Count
